product_description: Product Description Arm & Hammer for Pets Tartar Control Dog Dental Kit is designed to support daily oral hygiene by helping reduce plaque and tartar buildup through regular brushing. The kit includes dog toothpaste along with a toothbrush and fingerbrush to help maintain cleaner teeth and healthier gums at home. The beef flavored toothpaste is formulated with baking soda and enzymes to help clean teeth and neutralize odors during brushing. Baking soda supports fresher breath, while enzymatic action helps break down buildup on the tooth surface when used consistently. Regular brushing supports overall mouth cleanliness as part of routine pet care. The included toothbrush and fingerbrush provide flexible options based on dog size and comfort. These tools help improve reach along teeth and gum lines, supporting more effective brushing habits. This dental kit is suitable for puppies and adult dogs and can be used as part of a consistent at-home dental care routine. Arm & Hammer pet dental products offer a practical solution for maintaining dog oral hygiene and fresher breath through regular use. brand_description Arm & Hammer.

product_description: Brushing your dog and cat's teeth is an important procedure of overall care. Grime and tartar not only cause bad breath, but can also result in the loss of teeth and more serious dental hygiene issues. Bad teeth can lead to life-threatening and painful infections. These infections can damage the kidneys, heart, and liver. By regularly brushing your dog or cat's teeth, you will help to boost the health, happiness, and longevity of your canine and feline friends. name: Burt's Bees for Pets Naturally Derived Oral Care Kit Dog Dental Kit with Toothpaste & Bamboo Toothbrush Dog Toothbrush and Toothpaste with Honeysuckle & Peppermint Oil, Fresh Mint Flavor (2.5 oz)
short_description: BURT'S BEES TOOTHPASTE & TOOTHBRUSH FOR DOGS - This dog dental care kit for dogs comes with everything dogs need to keep their oral health in tip top shape
DOG TOOTHPASTE IN FRESH MINT FLAVOR - This 2.5 oz tube of dog Burt's Bees toothpaste has honeysuckle and peppermint oil and comes in a fresh mint flavor dogs love
SOFT BAMBOO TOOTHBRUSH - This dog dental care kit comes with a soft bamboo toothbrush to make it the perfect toothbrush for dogs
99.5% NATURAL DOG TOOTHPASTE FORMULA - Pet parents feel good about using this dog toothpaste knowing that it is made with a 99.5% natural formula

EASY TO USE DOG DENTAL CARE KIT - For first time brushers, put a small amount of toothpaste on your finger and invite the dog to lick it off. Slowly progress to rubbing finger along the gum line and teeth. For best results, brush 2-3x/ week
product_description: Since 1984, Burt's Bees has been working with nature to create products that nurture your health. We believe that pets are family, so we're bringing the same natural attention and care to your closest furry friends. From Burt's Bees grooming products to dog dental care and cat dental products, Burt's Bees is here to keep your pet healthy. Natural, effective, and pH balanced for dogs, the Burt's Bees for Dogs Fresh Breath Oral Care Kit makes it easy to keep your dog's oral care healthy and clean. The Burt's Bees for Dogs Natural Oral Care Kit is the perfect dog dental care training kit for dogs. This dental care kit for dogs comes complete with a dog toothpaste and toothbrush set. The dog toothpaste is a 2.5 oz tube of 99.5% natural dog toothpaste. It is made with honeysuckle and peppermint oil and has a fresh mint flavor that puppies love. This dog toothpaste is made from natural ingredients to be safe and effective. This toothpaste for dogs has no colorants, no sulfates, no added fragrances, and is cruelty free. This dog dental care kit for dogs also comes with a soft bamboo toothbrush for dogs. When used with the Burt's Bees for Dogs Bamboo dog toothbrush with natural bristles, the dog toothpaste and dog toothbrush make the ideal dog oral care kit for your dog's oral care routine. Use Burt's Bees for dogs products that are made in the USA to give your dog healthy and clean teeth. Teach dogs about the importance of good dog dental health with this oral care kit for dogs. Directions: For first time brushers, place a small amount of toothpaste on your finger and invite the dog to lick it off. Slowly progress to rubbing your finger along the gumline and teeth. Then put a small amount of toothpaste on the Burt's Bees toothbrush and repeat. Always make this a positive experience for your dog. For best results, brush daily. Warnings: Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Store at room temperature. Not intended for human use.
